title: Build accounts view with hierarchy
description: Create accounts view showing hierarchical account tree with balances. Include expand/collapse, balance calculations, and drill-down to transactions.

title: Implement budget tracking
description: Create budget view showing budget vs actual spending by category. Include visual progress bars, alerts for over-budget categories, and monthly/yearly views.

title: Add pattern manager view
description: Create UI for managing categorization patterns. Support add/edit/delete patterns, live regex testing, conflict detection, and export to Python format.

title: Set up core TUI framework with navigation
description: Implement main application structure with Bubbletea, including view routing, keyboard shortcuts, and state management. Should support switching between different views (dashboard, accounts, transactions, reports).

title: Add comprehensive tests
description: Write unit tests for parser, categorizer, and UI components. Add integration tests for full workflows. Set up CI with test coverage reporting.

title: Add terminal charts and graphs
description: Implement terminal-based charts (line, bar, pie) for spending trends, category breakdowns, and net worth over time. Use ASCII art or termui library.

title: Add balance sheet report
description: Create balance sheet showing assets, liabilities, and equity. Include period selection and account drill-down.

title: Implement configuration system
description: Build configuration management with YAML config file. Support themes, keybindings, default file paths, and UI preferences. Include validation and defaults.

title: Build transaction list view with table
description: Create transaction list view with sortable columns (date, payee, amount, category). Include filtering, search, and multi-select capabilities. Use bubbles table component.

title: Implement Beancount file parser
description: Build parser to read and parse Beancount files. Should handle transactions, accounts, commodities, and metadata. Use lazy loading for large files.

title: Add help system and keyboard shortcuts guide
description: Create contextual help screens, keyboard shortcut overlay, and command mode. Include examples and tips for efficient workflows.

title: Create theming system
description: Implement customizable color themes (dracula, solarized, etc.) using lipgloss. Support loading themes from config and runtime switching.

title: Implement income statement report
description: Generate income statement showing income vs expenses with period comparison. Support month/quarter/year views and category breakdowns.

title: Implement batch operations
description: Add batch categorization with visual selection, pattern creation from selected transactions, and preview before applying changes.

title: Create dashboard view with charts
description: Build dashboard showing net worth, spending trends, and quick stats. Include ASCII/terminal charts for visualizations. Should display top categories and recent activity.

title: Optimize performance for large files
description: Implement lazy loading, caching, pagination, and background indexing for large Beancount files (>100k transactions). Profile and optimize hot paths.

title: Add safe file operations with undo/redo
description: Implement safe transaction editing with backup, validation, and atomic writes. Include undo/redo stack and optional git auto-commit.

title: Add smart categorization engine
description: Implement pattern matching and ML-based categorization suggestions. Should learn from user actions and provide confidence scores. Support regex patterns and merchant name matching.

title: Add CSV/OFX import functionality
description: Implement import from CSV and OFX files. Support mapping columns to Beancount fields, auto-categorization during import, and duplicate detection.

title: Implement category picker with tree view
description: Build hierarchical category picker with expand/collapse. Support fuzzy search, recent categories, and usage frequency display. Include both tree and flat list views.

title: Build custom query builder
description: Create visual query builder with SQL mode. Support SELECT, WHERE, GROUP BY, ORDER BY with autocomplete. Include query templates and result export.
